name: Smartwool Merino 150 Baselayer 1/4 Zip - Women's
description: Add this amazing wool and nylon base to your ski layers or hiking setup. The naturally high-tech wool maintains warmth and controls odours, and the synthetic fibres wick wetness and help the fabric withstand the rigours of the wild. In cool or damp conditions, merino wool is an unbeatable material for holding warmth and creating next-to-skin comfort.Made of a naturally antimicrobial merino wool blend.Nylon core for increased durability, while keeping the soft merino wool next to your skin.Raglan sleeve design eliminates shoulder seams.Stretch merrow stitching for chafe-free comfort.Side seams wrap to the front for a body-enhancing fit.Quarter zip provides ventilation options.
